name: Trap the Enemies
description:
Navigate your way through 3 levels while avoiding or trapping enemies!

Simple interactive switches activate or deactivate obstacles allowing you to lure enemies out of the way.  Super simple game made for GDFG's Monthly Game Jam #8

Controls:

Move - A/D

Interact - E

Credits:

Music - Absolutely Free Music (Unity Store)

Textures/Materials - Futuristic Panel Textures Lite (Unity Store)
